order by totalprice,createTime desc

mapper.select:
select t.orderNo,t.consignee,t.consigneeAddress,t.grossWeight,t.consigneeTel,t.totalWayBill,t.wayBillNo,t.rate,t.destinationCountry,ts.netweight,ts.weight,ts.goodsName,ts.goodsNo,ts.specifications,ts.goodsAmount,ts.unitPrice,ts.totalPrice,t.currency,t.itemCode,t.createTime from t_order_out_bs t left join t_order_out_sku_bs ts on t.orderno =ts.orderno
order by createtime desc,orderno
